title: Sifrei Bamidbar
enDesc: Sifrei Bamidbar is a halakhic (legal) midrash on the Book of Numbers compiled around the third century in Israel that incorporates much aggadic (narrative) material as well. While primarily from the school of Rabbi Yishmael, it also includes sections from other schools of interpretation.
enShortDesc: Midrash on the Book of Numbers from the school of Rabbi Yishmael.
heShortDesc: מדרש על ספר במדבר מבית מדרשו של רבי ישמעאל.
